attributes.action: Allow Legal Aid for Inquests for Bereaved Forces Families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Families of HM Forces are denied automatic legal aid for Inquests into their deaths, soldiers and airforce personnel are being killed in Iraq and Afghanistan yet their families are having to pay thousands of pounds for their inquest. This is deporable and pathetic of this Government

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow Legal Aid for Inquests for Bereaved Forces Families."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13283.asp

Prime Minister's Office
